TITLE: "The Political Logic Of Willow Project’s Approval"
AUTHOR: Nives Dolsak and Aseem Prakash, Contributor
DESCRIPTION: Biden’s approval of the Willow project contradicts his climate goals. But Biden probably needs support from the Alaskan Congressional delegation. Moreover, he is pursuing climate goals via technological transformation of energy and transportation sectors, and not via drilling bans.

TITLE: "Is The “Autonomous Supply Chain” A Pipe Dream?"
AUTHOR: Steve Banker, Contributor
DESCRIPTION: Companies work off of long-term plans. But orders get cancelled, ports have congestion, factory machines go down, and that long-term plan is not executable. What do companies do when this happens. A company called Aera Technology has a clever solution.
